GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
mxser: fix xmit_buf leak in activate when LSR == 0xff

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 685b6d16bf89595310b5d61394c9b97cc9505c7c, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit 6769140d304731f0a3b177470a2adb4bacd9036b. For more details please see the references link.
